title: Tilly, Personal Chef
description: Kendra and James just got married.She hired Tilly, a personal chef.Their lives will never be the same.* * *Reviews."I loved the different characters, smiled when Tilly was teaching James to cook and it wrapped up suitably......I wish it had been a longer book......why not write a longer book for us all - loved it! But if you want a happy few hours this is gentle and lovely." Amazon UK reader"Chick lit. A quirky yet entertaining story, full of odd characters." From Shelfari.com.
author: James Piper
